value.string:
"""
 Run upgrader
 """
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 portal_alarms = portal.portal_alarms
 
 def launchUpgraderAlarm(alarm_id, after_method_id=[]):
 """ Get the alarm and use sense and solve """
 upgrader_alarm = getattr(portal_alarms, alarm_id, None)
 if upgrader_alarm is not None and upgrader_alarm.sense():
 # call solve method
 kw = dict(tag=alarm_id)
 if len(after_method_id) > 0:
 kw["after_method_id"] = after_method_id
 method_id = upgrader_alarm.getSolveMethodId()
 if method_id not in (None, ''):
 method = getattr(upgrader_alarm.activate(**kw), method_id)
 method()
 return [method_id] + after_method_id
 return after_method_id
 
 previous_method_id = launchUpgraderAlarm('upgrader_check_pre_upgrade')
 
 previous_method_id.extend(['recursiveImmediateReindexObject',
 'immediateReindexObject'])
 
 previous_method_id = launchUpgraderAlarm('upgrader_check_upgrader',
 after_method_id=previous_method_id)
 
 previous_method_id.append('updateBusinessTemplateFromUrl')
 previous_method_id = launchUpgraderAlarm('upgrader_check_post_upgrade',
 after_method_id=previous_method_id)
 
 # Nothing else to do, so we can disable.
 context.setEnabled(False)
 return
